created_at.description: Date and time when the user account was created

updated_at.description: Date and time when the user account was last updated

accessed_at.description: Date and time when the user last accessed the system

product_roles.description: Roles assigned to the user for accessing different products/features

enabled.description: Boolean indicating if the user account is active/enabled

paid_seat.description: Boolean indicating if the user account is on a paid seat/license

administrator.description: Boolean indicating if the user has administrative privileges

administrator_roles.description: Roles assigned to the user for administrative access

identity_provider.description: Identity provider used for user authentication
